section.p: The snake does not notice you cast a swift dowsing spell. Now you know which door leads to the treasure. You point to it confidently.

Again the gem flickers with light. Slowly four of the other doors creak open, each revealing a poison-tipped dart that would have slain you if you had chosen that door. Now only two doors remain unopened, says the snake. Do you wish to cleave to your original choice? I’ll give you a last chance to change your mind.

choices.choice: Choose the other closed door instead
